title: Hour 2: Kevin's Heaven
description:
Stephen A. Smith and Kendrick Perkins debate if Kevin Durant should want out of the team if Kyrie Irving leaves the Nets. The guys discuss which team won Thursday's NBA Draft and react to the Knicks trading the 11th pick to the Thunder. Later, the crew debates which player wore it best at the NBA Draft.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: If Kyrie Irving leaves, should Kevin Durant want out?
